scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus on the cross, bleeding from his wounds. To his left stands the Virgin Mary, draped in a blue mantle and praying. To his right is Saint John the Evangelist, also in prayer, wearing a red cloak over a blue tunic. At the foot of the cross, a skull and crossbones are visible, symbolizing Golgotha, the place of the skull. The background features a landscape with trees and distant buildings under a blue sky with a crescent moon and a sun.
